snippet: After undergoing a $3 million renovation, the Center for Architecture in Greenwich Village has expanded again, inspiring other projects across the country.
lead_paragraph: After undergoing a $3 million renovation, the Center for Architecture in Greenwich Village has expanded again, inspiring other projects across the country.

headline.main: Building Architects’ Centers to Capture Public Attention
